mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codegroup( ifcgName, ifcgUseNy, ifcgOrder, ifcgDesc, ifcgDelNy, ifcgRegist, ifcgEdit )VALUES( #{ifcgName}, #{ifcgUseNy}, #{ifcgOrder}, #{ifcgDesc}, #{ifcgDelNy}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDesc, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgRegist, a.ifcgEdit FROM yuz.codegroup a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE yuz.codegroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgUseNy = #{ifcgUseNy}, ifcgOrder = #{ifcgOrder}, ifcgDesc = #{ifcgDesc}, ifcgDelNy = #{ifcgDelNy} WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
UPDATE yuz.codegroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
